dataList.name: Decamillennial Hearthflame
dataList.desc: Turn End: enemies with 3+ Burn Count activates Burn one more time (reduce Burn Count by 1)

dataList.name: Purloined Flame
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Burn or 'Unique Burn'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

On Hit with a Skill(including E.G.O Skills): if the target has 3+ Burn Count, activate Burn once on the target. (target loses 1 Burn Count; activates once per Skill)

Turn End: targets with 3+ Burn Count activates Burn one more time (target loses 1 Burn Count)

If a target with Burn is defeated(for Abnormalities, when the Core is defeated), inflict its remaining Burn Potency to one of the enemies with the least Burn Potency at the next Turn Start.

Turn Start: for this turn, inflict 4 [AttackDown] to enemies with Burn

If a target with Burn is defeated, at the next Turn Start, (defeated enemy's Burn Potency / 15) allies with Skills that inflict Burn gain 2 [AttackDmgUp]. (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Activate Burn once
Activate Burn 1 more time
Inflict (Burn Potency on defeated enemy)/2 Burn Potency
Inflict 4 [AttackDown]
Gain 2 [AttackDmgUp]

dataList.name: Ruptured Blood Sac
dataList.desc: On ally Clash Win: activate the enemy's Bleed once (3 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Activate Bleed once

dataList.name: Hemorrhagic Shock
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Bleed or 'Unique Bleed' effects. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

On ally Clash Win: activate the enemy's Bleed once. (once per turn for each ally)

Enemies become Staggerable by Bleed Damage; if the an enemy gets Staggered due to Bleed damage mid-Clash, activate Bleed (# of remaining enemy Coins) times

If all enemies have Bleed, they lose 2 Defense Levels. At Turn End, inflict (# of Bleed activations x 2) [DefenseDown] (max 20)

When inflicting Bleed Potency or 'Unique Bleed' with Skill effects, inflict 3 Bleed Potency and +1 Bleed Count on the target

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Clash Win, activate Bleed on the target once
After Clashing, activate the enemy's Bleed (# of remaining Coins on self) times
Inflict (# of Bleed activations x 2) [DefenseDown] (max 20)
Inflict 3 Bleed Potency and +1 Bleed Count

dataList.name: Gemstone Oscillator
dataList.desc:
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed Tremor Count: if the target does not have Tremor, inflict +2 Tremor Count

At 3+ Sloth Reson. including this Skill, inflict +3 Tremor Count instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed Tremor Count, inflict +2 Tremor Count
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed Tremor Count and is a part of a 3+ Sloth Reson.: inflict +3 Tremor Count

dataList.name: Wobbling Keg
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: at 8+ Tremor Count, Clash Power +1

When defeating or Staggering an enemy with a Skill that consumes Tremor Count on self: gain +(Tremor Count consumed / 4) Tremor Count (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: At 8+ Tremor Count, Clash Power +1
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes Tremor Count: gain Tremor Count

dataList.name: Epicenter
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Tremor Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)
(If an Identity only has Attack Skills that gain Tremor Count on self, this E.G.O Gift does not activate for them)

When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed Tremor Count on self: if the target does not have Tremor, inflict +3 Tremor Count

Turn Start: gain Clash Power +(Tremor Count on self / 5) (max 3)

When using a Skill that consumes Tremor Count on self: if the target is defeated or Staggered, gain +(Tremor Count consumed / 2) Tremor Count (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumed Tremor Count on self: if the target does not have Tremor, inflict +3 Tremor Count
Turn Start: gain (Tremor Count on self / 5) Clash Power
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes Tremor Count: gain Tremor Count

dataList.name: Omnivibro-octovecti-bell
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Tremor Potency, Count, or 'Unique Tremor'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)
(If an Identity only has Attack Skills that gain Tremor Count on self, this E.G.O Gift does not activate for them)

When winning a Clash with a Skill that inflicts Tremor Potency or Count, or consumes Tremor Count on self: inflict (# of remaining Coins) Tremor Potency against the target; if the target does not have Tremor, inflict +3 Tremor Count

Turn Start: gain (1 + (Tremor Count on self / 5)) [ParryingResultUp]. (max 3)

When using a Skill that consumes Tremor Count on self: when defeating or Staggering a target, gain (Tremor Count consumed / 2) Tremor Count (once per Skill)

Skills that consume Tremor Count on self deal +(Tremor consumed on self + Tremor Potency on the enemy + 5)% more damage (except E.G.O Skills; max 50%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Clash Win, inflict Tremor equal to the # of remaining Coins. If the target does not have Tremor, inflict Tremor Count
Turm Start: gain Clash Power Up based on Tremor Count on self
When winning a Clash with a Skill that consumes Tremor Count: gain Tremor Count
Skills that consume [Tremor] Count deal more damage

dataList.name: Shard of Apocalypse
dataList.desc: If the target has less than 15 Rupture Potency, inflict 1 additional Potency when inflicting Rupture Potency

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 1 additional Rupture Potency

dataList.name: Eerie Effigy
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Rupture Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)
Rupture effects deal +100% more damage against enemy Shields
If the target has less than 15 Rupture Potency, inflict 2 more Potency when inflicting Rupture Potency

If Rupture cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +1 instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Rupture effects deal +100% more damage against Shields
Inflict 2 additional Rupture Potency
If Rupture cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +1 instead

dataList.name: Ruin
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Rupture Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

Rupture effects deal +150% more damage against enemy Shield

Turn Start: enemies or Parts with Rupture lose (3 + (Rupture Potency / 2)) Offense Level and Defense Level. (max 6)

When inflicting Rupture Potency with Skill effects, inflict 2 Rupture Potency and +1 Rupture Count against the target. If the target has less than 15 Rupture Potency, inflict 2 additional Rupture Potency.

If Rupture cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +(4 / # of Coins) instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Rupture effects deal +150% more damage against Shields
Enemies with Rupture lose Offense and Defense Levels
When inflicting Rupture Potency with Skill effects, Inflict 2 Rupture Potency and +1 Rupture Count on target
If Rupture cannot be applied due to Skill effects, gain Coin Power +(4 / # of Coins) instead

dataList.name: Cantabile
dataList.desc: When using base Attack Skills, if the target has 5+ Sinking Potency, heal (Sinking Potency on the target / 10) SP on self (max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP based on Sinking on the target

dataList.name: Faded Overcoat
dataList.desc: Turn End: if there are 3+ enemies with -45 SP, all allies gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain 2 [AttackUp]

dataList.name: Surging Globe
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Sinking Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

When using a base Attack Skill, if the enemy has 5+ Sinking Potency, heal (Sinking Potency on the target / 10) SP on self (max 5)

Turn End: next turn, all allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP (max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP based on Sinking on the target
All allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP (max 3)

dataList.name: Impending Wave
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply Sinking Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill that inflicts Sinking Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking', inflict 4 Sinking Potency and +3 Sinking Count at Turn End (once per turn for each enemy)

When using a base Attack Skill, if the target has 10+ Sinking Potency, heal (Sinking Potency on the target / 10) SP on self and inflict the same amount as [DefenseDown] against the target (max 5; once per turn for each enemy)

Turn End: all allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP (max 6)

For this Encounter, allies who used Attack Skills that inflict Sinking Potency, Count, or 'Unique Sinking' 3 times inflict 2 additional Sinking Potency when inflicting Sinking Potency (takes effect starting from the 3rd Skill that fits the above conditions)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit with Skills that inflict Sinking: inflict more Sinking Potency and Count at Turn End
Heal SP and inflict [DefenseDown] based on Sinking on the target
All allies gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of enemies with -45 SP
+2 inflicted Sinking Potency

dataList.name: Angel's Cut
dataList.desc: Turn End: when an ally has more than 20 Poise Potency, the said unit consumes 1 Poise Potency to gain +1 Poise Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Consume 1 Poise Potency to gain 1 Poise Count

dataList.name: Cask Spirits
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply or gain Poise Potency or Count. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

Turn End: If an ally has more than 20 Poise Potency on self, the ally consumes 1 Poise Potency to gain 1 Poise Count

Turn End: 1 ally with the highest Poise Potency and 1 ally with the highest Poise Count] gain 2 [Agility] and 1 [AttackUp] (can activate on the same Identity)

When gaining Poise Potency from Skill effects, gain additional 2 Poise Potency and +2 Poise Count. If the sum of Poise Potency and Count on self is less than 20, gain 3 Poise Potency and +3 Poise Count instead.

Turn End: at more than 40 Poise Potency, consume 15 Poise Potency to [Discard] 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of that unit's Skill Slots (once per turn for each character)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Poise Count
Apply 2 Haste and 1 Offense Level Up
When gaining Poise Potency with Skill effects, gain additional Potency and Count
Discard a Skill of the lowest rank in this unit's Skill Slot

dataList.name: Miniature Telepole
dataList.desc: After Attack with a Skill Attack that consumed 7+ Charge Count on self: if the target is defeated, gain (Charge Count consumed by the Skill / 4) Charge Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Charge Count based on Charge Count consumed

dataList.name: Insulator
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain Charge Count or 'Unique Charge'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

After Attack With a Skill Attack that consumes Charge Count on self: if the target is defeated, gain (Charge Count consumed by the Skill / 3) Charge Count

Turn Start: at less than 3 Charge Count, gain +3 Charge Count
Turn Start: at 3+ Charge Count, gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Charge Count based on Charge Count consumed
Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] or Charge Count based on Charge Count

dataList.name: T-5 Perpetual Motion Machine
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain Charge Count or 'Unique Charge'. (except E.G.O Skills, only counts Identities on the field at Encounter Start)

Turn Start: at less than 3 Charge Count, gain +3 Charge Count.
Turn Start: at 5+ Charge Count, gain +2 min/max Speed, 1 [Enhancement], and 2 [AttackDmgUp].

After Attack with a Skill that consumed Charge Count on self: if the target is defeated, gain +(Charge Count consumed by the Skill / 3) Charge Count; next turn, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueUp]

After Attack with a Skill 3 that consumed Charge Count on self: if the target is defeated, or if the ally who used the Skill is at 3+ Charge, they add 1 Skill 3 to the list of Skills for the next upcoming turn. (once per turn for each ally; 'Unique Charge' does not interact with this effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] or Charge Count based on Charge Count
Gain Charge Count based on Charge Count consumed. Next turn, gain [PlusCoinValueUp]
After Attack with a Skill 3 that consumed Charge Count, add 1 Skill 3 to the Skill list
